category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MECTRevisionChangeClosureRule
preference.preference_description: Specifies the name of the closure rule to be used for outputting additional objects in the "MESINTEG_ValidateReleaseAndExport" and "ME-create-revision-change-xml-AH" workflow handlers delta XML for removed and replaced change elements as controlled by the "MECTRevisionChangeAddAdditional" preference. If not specified, the closure rule "AccountabilityAll" is used. Valid value is the name of a closure rule.
